definition: a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)
a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)
lit. a bird startled by the mere twang of a bow (idiom)/fig. sb who frightens easily, due to past experiences

lit. once you've shot the arrow, there's no getting it back (idiom)/fig. once you started sth, there's no turning back/to have to finish what one started/to be determined to reach one's goals in spite of setbacks
pinyin: kai1 gong1 mei2 you3 hui2 tou2 jian4

definition: lit. to shoot from both sides (idiom)/fig. to display ambidexterity/to slap with one hand and then the other, in quick succession/to use both feet equally (football)
to hunch over/to stoop/to arch one's back (upward)
lit. to see a bow reflected in a cup as a snake (idiom); fig. unnecessary suspicions/overly fearful
to bow/to bend at the waist
to bend the body at the waist/to bow
Gongchangling district of Liaoyang city 遼陽市|辽阳市[Liao2 yang2 shi4], Liaoning

sentences.english: It was low growing, with a bow just high enough to catch her.
sentences.chinese: 它是低增長，只是高要抓住她的弓。

sentences.english: And Elisha said unto him, Take bow and arrows.
sentences.chinese: 又對以色列王說，你用手拿弓。

sentences.english: My back's crooked like a question mark.
sentences.chinese: 我媽說我的背弓得像個問號。

sentences.english: It was God, not the sword or the bow, that drove out the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 是上帝將敵人驅逐而不是刀和弓。

sentences.english: An arrow would be useless without a bow and an archer.
sentences.chinese: 沒有弓和弓箭手，一支箭是不會有用的。

sentences.english: They also brought with them the horse-drawn chariot and introduced the composite bow into the Egyptian arsenal.
sentences.chinese: 他們將馬拉的運輸車和綜合弓，帶入了埃及的武庫。

sentences.english: Together these proteins give the artery its strength and flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 這些蛋白質聯手提供了動脈的強度及弓單性。

sentences.english: He tried to bow his fiddle but always missed.
sentences.chinese: 他試着用弓拉小提琴，但總是拉偏了。

sentences.english: Protected by lamellar armour, giving these horse archers better protection against enemy attacks.
sentences.chinese: 庫爾德弓騎兵身穿鱗甲，能有效抵禦敵軍攻擊。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical curative effect of segmental arch technique in incisor luxation.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價片段弓矯治技術治療前牙外傷的效果。

sentences.english: In his hands he held a bow and arrows.
sentences.chinese: 他手持一張弓和一些箭。

sentences.english: Sing as you raise your bow, Shoot straighter than before.
sentences.chinese: 唱你提高你的弓，射比以前更直。

sentences.english: One was with a bow, named Lance.
sentences.chinese: 一段是與一張名叫朗斯的弓的戀情。

sentences.english: Don't strain your bow to the breaking-point.
I played shoot the target with a crossbow and got a bulls eye!
sentences.chinese: 我用十字弓射中了目標還贏得了一隻牛眼睛呢。

sentences.english: For even as He loves the arrows that flies, so He loves also the bow that is stable.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他愛那飛出的箭，一如他愛那安穩的弓。

definition: to bend the body at the waist/to bow
